Articles.Content: This is a place to talk about anything from boringly tame to wildly enlightening theories you may have heard or thought of.

Joseph,

While we applaud your initiative in starting more science based discussions, this entire sub-forum is dedicated to the discussion of science.  Perhaps you'd like to revise your very open ended thread, and have it focus on a more specific topic that people can discuss?

Indeed, if you are interested in theoretical discussion, this thread:

might be a good place to start.

Also, welcome to the forums.

There aren't many scientific theories in existence for the reason they're made out of evidence and are therefore strong and scarce.

 

Maybe you mean hypotheses? Plenty of those out there.
